divs: Sighting DetailsWas taking picture of CAK (Akron-Canton Airport)tower, trying to catch green beacon in shot. No visible stars at time as can be seen from surrounding photo area. No visible aircraft or contrails at time of photo (0500e). Took two photos in @ a 20sec span. when looking at same noticed white dots on both that had apparently moved in between photos. Upon zooming in noticed first pic appeared as one dot and second pic appeared as triangle dots and one seperate.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around May 20th 2013
